backend/main.mo: Defines core data types, maps, and authorization-enabled actor methods for managing test benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global theme provider, authentication-aware routing, and root layout with AppShell and error boundary.
Empty placeholder file for admin access control component.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reloadable fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures backend actor availability, showing loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that blocks access until Internet Identity is initialized and available.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component enabling item reordering through drag-and-drop.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook providing drag-and-drop state management and item reordering logic for lists.
Defines the main application shell with navigation, theme toggle, logout handling, and responsive headers.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Provides floating buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Implements a tag-like input for selecting or typing a single entity with suggestions and validation.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Renders a grid of predefined avatar options and triggers selection callbacks.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays a user's avatar from predefined or custom sources with cache-busting support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
Zustand store providing a timestamp-based cache-buster for avatar URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Manages persistent dashboard chart type state using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helpers for Internet Identity using Dfinity AuthClient.
Periodically calls the backend to update the user's last-seen timestamp when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for fetching and mutating benches, users, components, and preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the admin page.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Empty placeholder for an admin benches panel.
Empty placeholder for an admin documents panel.
Empty placeholder for an admin users panel.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays test bench details with components, documents, history, editing, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Lists all test benches with search, filtering, and a modal to add new benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal for creating a new test bench with fields, validation, uploads, tags, and component duplication options.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editable table for adding, modifying, duplicating, and removing bench components with expiration status handling.
Manages bench documents by category, supporting upload with progress, versioning, download, and deletion.
Displays sorted bench history entries with timestamps, user info, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error states, falling back to a placeholder if needed.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Form component for selecting document categories and attaching files with version fields.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog for duplicating a component to multiple benches with selection and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal form to edit bench metadata, photo, and tags with validation and update submission.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Interactive input for adding, removing, and selecting tag items with suggestion filtering.
Static placeholder page describing upcoming bench creation features.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Builds a pie chart summarizing component health status counts using expiration rules.
Displays a bar chart of component status counts with optional bench filtering.
Generates a bar chart grouping components into time-to-expiration buckets with bench and range filters.
Renders a pie chart showing document counts grouped by category.
Charts monthly expiration counts over time using either bar or line mode.
Shows a bar or line chart of benches ranked by number of expired components.
Renders a health gauge card summarizing component statuses (ok, expiring soon, expired) with progress bars. Computes percentages from provided bench component data.
Displays draggable dashboard statistic and chart cards, initializing order from localStorage. Includes stat cards and criticality/deadline charts based on bench data.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page fetching benches, components, documents, and user profile to compute statuses and render sections. Supports customizable section ordering and document downloads.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing users to edit personal info, expiration thresholds, avatar, and custom photos. Loads and saves profile data, permissions, and test bench settings.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Simple signâ€‘in page using Internet Identity with branding and error handling. Provides a button to trigger login and displays status messages.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to asset paths and provides helpers to get avatar paths and list available avatar IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking. Converts file bytes and attaches progress callback if provided.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and returns a default bench photo as an ExternalBlob. Loads image bytes from a predefined asset path with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads an ExternalBlob as a file by generating a temporary URL and triggering browser download. Handles byte extraction and cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold settings with localStorage fallback and profile-based overrides. Provides helper to compute component expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple unique ID using timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Provides a deterministic client-side text cleanup function that normalizes spacing, capitalization, punctuation, and common abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Implements simple keyword-based search over test benches by matching query terms against multiple bench fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, clearing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains validation helpers for emails, domain-restricted emails, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings with custom plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files, enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliasing, dev server proxying, and build settings.
project_state.json: Project state file describing architecture notes, known issues, and a pending fix request for real-time Health Book updates after component moves.
